snippet: A British regulator is planning to review competition in investment banking. | Greece requests an extension to its loan agreement. | Two deals put the spotlight on a secretive banking family. | Uber expands its financing round.
abstract: A British regulator is planning to review competition in investment banking. | Greece requests an extension to its loan agreement. | Two deals put the spotlight on a secretive banking family. | Uber expands its financing round.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Britain to Examine Competition in Banking
